title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Overseas Program Support - Administrative

description.narrative: Overseas program support costs in Kenya. Includes overseas staff salaries and benefit costs, leases, staff travel, communications, conferences, supplies, equipment and International Cooperative Administrative Support Services (ICASS). Excludes costs for training, medical and security.

activity-date.narrative: Date unavailable. Calculated start date is the earliest transaction date
Date unavailable. Calculated end date is the latest transaction date

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Medical Support - Administrative

description.narrative: All costs associated with the medical support of volunteers in Kenya. Includes costs of medical staff and care, staff and Volunteer medical-related travel, Volunteer medevac accompaniment travel, medical supplies, and distinct medical unit costs.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Pre-Service Training - Administrative

description.narrative: All costs incurred for pre-Service training of volunteers in Kenya including pre-service training in the U.S., pre-departure staging costs, and pre-service training overseas.

title.narrative: U.S. Peace Corps Volunteer Safety and Security - Administrative

description.narrative: Volunteer safety and security costs in Kenya directly associated with Volunteer and staff safety (preparedness and training), and the physical security of Peace Corps-leased properties. Includes guard services, security staff, security-related travel, supplies, equipment, physical property upgrades, and the Office of Safety and Security.
